item.title: Boredom
item.description: The thing they don’t tell you about quarantine is how freaking grating th boredom is. Or, I don’t even know if it’s boredom, it’s just the absence of anything to be excited about. Anyway, why aren’t auto-scaling groups controlled with a PID?
